Package com.ibm.streams.management.job

Interface OperatorPortMXBean

All Known Subinterfaces:
OperatorInputPortMXBean, OperatorOutputPortMXBean
public interface OperatorPortMXBean
OperatorPortMXBean provides attributes and operations for managing an operator port of a Streams job.

Note: The job must be registered before accessing any of these attributes or operations. See InstanceMXBean.registerJob(BigInteger) for more information.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT
     
    static final String
    TYPE
    TYPE is used to identify this bean as an operator port bean when building the bean's ObjectName.

  • Field Details

    • IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT

      static final String IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TYPE

      static final String TYPE
      TYPE is used to identify this bean as an operator port bean when building the bean's ObjectName. The value is "domain.instance.job.operator.port"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getConnections

      Set<String> getConnections()
      Returns the connection identifiers for active connections for the port. The connection identifier can be used on the ObjectNameBuilder.operatorConnection(String, String, String) call to get the ObjectName of the managed bean for the operator connection.
      Returns:
      the connection identifiers.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getIndexWithinOperator

      int getIndexWithinOperator()
      Returns the index of the port within the operator. This is a zero-based index.
      Returns:
      the port index.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getJob

      BigInteger getJob()
      Returns the unique identifier for the job containing the operator to which the port belongs.
      Returns:
      the job identifier.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of the port.
      Returns:
      the port name.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getOperator

      String getOperator()
      Returns the name of the physical operator to which the port belongs.
      Returns:
      the operator name.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getPe

      BigInteger getPe()
      Returns the unique identifier for the the processing unit (PE) containing the operator to which the port belongs.
      Returns:
      the PE identifier.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • retrieveMetrics

      Set<Metric> retrieveMetrics()
      Retrieves the metric information and values for the operator port. A metric is a measurement of an element associated with the operator port.
      Returns:
      the set of metrics for the operator port.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.
      See Also:
      • Metric
      • InstanceMXBean.retrieveJobSystemMetricMetadata()
